title: Yoga Class Histogram
question_text:
Shivani leads classes at a local yoga studio. For the past two weeks, she has kept track of how many students have been in each class. The results are displayed below.




Which of the following best describes the shape and median of the distribution?

choices.text:
The shape is unimodal and the median is at
7.5
.

The shape is skewed right and the median is at about
12.5
.

The shape is skewed right and the median is at
15
.

The shape is skewed left and the median is at
15
.

The shape is skewed left and the median is at about
17
.
